metadata.synopsis: A wood elf standing guard by the Last Light barricades.

0.speaker: Harper Elifer
0.text: You were good to give the lie to Marcus' deception. Who knows what he might've done.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

1.speaker: Harper Elifer
1.text: Don't look into the shadows too long - feels like the dark's eaten into my soul.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Met.

2.speaker: Harper Elifer
2.text: No one's getting past me. Not again.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.

3.speaker: Harper Elifer
3.text: Think staring out into the dark so much is doing something to my eyes.
3.context: InternalNodeContext: Protected state. Barrier is On, nothing bad happened yet. Not Met.

4.speaker: Harper Elifer
4.context: InternalNodeContext: State after repelling the attack of the Flaming Fist traitor. NPCs are afraid of other possible attacks.
